Indicator: Violent crime in public spaces - Number
How Calculated: Number of reported crimes involving a firearm with an outdoor location, excluding domestic incidents
Source(s): Chicago Police Department Research and Development Division

How Calculated: Hardship scores are calculated at the community area level using 2014 5-year ACS population estimates
Child Opportunity Index (COI) scores are calculated at the community area level using 2014 COI estimates http://www.diversitydatakids.org/data/childopportunitymap/3310/chicago-joliet-naperville
